oai_dc:dc.dc:title: American flag on Second Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Second Street; flags; streets; 2010s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A large American flag covers a building on Second Avenue, at the corner of Floyd Alley. Elliott's Restaurant, Charles Vergos' Rendevous and Western Union are visible.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lanier, Robert
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Robert Lanier; Manuscript collection processed by Victoria Grey;
